secondary.description: Subtle background color. Often used to contain related items.

base.description: Default background color for primary buttons.

strong.description: Hover and active state for primary buttons. Background color for member chat messages.

weak.description: Subtle background color for success messages.

base.description: No uses currently.

strong.description: No uses currently.

weak.description: Subtle background color for warning messages.

base.description: No uses currently.

strong.description: No uses currently.

weak.description: Subtle background color for danger messages.

base.description: Default background color for primary destructive buttons.

strong.description: Hover and active state for primary destructive buttons.

weak.description: Weak scrim color used behind bottom sheets and loading spinners.

base.description: Base scrim color used behind full-screen modals and/or alerts.

strong.description: No uses currently.

primary.description: Default color for text and icons.

contrast.description: Contrasting color to use for text or icons on "base" or "strong" background colors.

base.description: Default color for interactive text and icons.

strong.description: Hover and active state for interactive text and icons.

base.description: Default color for success/positive text and icons.

strong.description: Hover and active state for interactive success text and icons.

base.description: Default color for warning text and icons.

strong.description: Hover and active state for interactive warning text and icons.

base.description: Default color for danger/destructive text and icons.

strong.description: Hover and active state for danger/destructive text and icons.

weak.description: Disabled border for inputs or selectable buttons.

strong.description: Hover and active states for default border.

contrast.description: Contrasting color to use for borders on "base" or "strong" background colors.

base.description: Default color for interactive borders.

strong.description: Hover and active state for interactive borders.

base.description: Default color for success/positive borders.

strong.description: Hover and active state for interactive success borders.

base.description: Default color for warning borders.

strong.description: Hover and active state for interactive warning borders.

base.description: Default color for danger/destructive borders.

strong.description: Hover and active state for interactive danger/destructive borders.

base.description: Default border for text inputs or selectable buttons.
